alert.note: Alert for Ellis; Trego (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued October 03 at 12:23PM CDT until October 03 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 030 AND 031... The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a Red Flag Warning for wind and low relative humidity, which is in effect until 6 PM CDT this evening. * AFFECTED AREA...In Kansas, Fire Weather Zone 030 Trego and Fire Weather Zone 031 Ellis. * WINDS...South around 20 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 18 percent. * IMPACTS...
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
